James Oyedeji (June 1953 - 4 May 2016), nke a na-akpọ Uncle Bode ma ọ bụ Uncle Bodey, bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu na Ghana, onye bụkwa Chief Executive nke Tudu Mighty Jets.

Oyedeji nwere nzere MSc nke akụ na ụba. A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu, a na-akpọ ya "Uncle Bodey" ma ọ bụ "Uncle bodey" n'ihi ihe ọmụma ya dị ukwuu banyere egwuregwu West Africa, ọkachasị bọọlụ na ịkụ ọkpọ. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Chief Executive nke Tudu mighty jets and okwawu united
Oyedeji nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 63 na 4 June 2016 na 37 Ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha na Accra mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọrịa strok; a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na 2015 n'ihi nsogbu obi. E ji emume otu izu mara ọnwụ ya.
